verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%>, king <S%G935><s%> of Salem <S%G4532><s%>, priest <S%G2409><s%> of the most high <S%G5310><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> met <S%G4876><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> returning <S%G5290><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the slaughter <S%G2871><s%> of the kings <S%G935><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> him <S%G846><s%>;

To whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> gave <S%G3307><s%> a tenth part <S%G1181><s%> of <S%G575><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>; first <S%G4412><s%> <S%G99999><s%> being by interpretation <S%G2059><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> after that <S%G1899><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of Salem <S%G4532><s%>, which is <S%G3603><s%>, King <S%G935><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%>;

Without father <S%G540><s%>, without mother <S%G282><s%>, without descent <S%G35><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> beginning <S%G746><s%> of days <S%G2250><s%>, nor <S%G3383><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> made like <S%G871><s%> unto the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>; remains <S%G3306><s%> a priest <S%G2409><s%> <S%G99999><s%> continually <S%G1336><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> consider <S%G2334><s%> how great <S%G4080><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> was <S%G3739><s%>, unto whom even <S%G2532><s%> the patriarch <S%G3966><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> the tenth <S%G1181><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the spoils <S%G2334><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> they that are <S%G2983><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the sons <S%G5207><s%> of Levi <S%G3017><s%>, who receive <S%G2983><s%> the office of the priesthood <S%G2405><s%>, have <S%G2192><s%> a commandment <S%G1785><s%> to take tithes of <S%G586><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, that <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%>, of <S%G80><s%> their <S%G846><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%>, though <S%G2539><s%> they come out <S%G1831><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the body <S%G3751><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> he whose descent is <S%G1075><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> counted <S%G1075><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%> received tithes <S%G1183><s%> of Abraham <S%G11><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G2127><s%> him that had <S%G2192><s%> the promises <S%G1860><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> contradiction <S%G485><s%> the lesser <S%G1640><s%> is blessed <S%G2127><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the greater <S%G2909><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> men <S%G444><s%> that die <S%G599><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> tithes <S%G1181><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> he <S%G3140><s%> receives them <S%G3140><s%>, of whom it is witnessed that <S%G3754><s%> he lives <S%G2198><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I may so say <S%G2031><s%>, Levi <S%G3017><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>, who receives <S%G2983><s%> tithes <S%G1181><s%>, payed tithes <S%G1183><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G3751><s%> of his father <S%G3962><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%> met <S%G4876><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3303><s%> <S%G99999><s%> perfection <S%G5050><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the Levitical <S%G3020><s%> priesthood <S%G2420><s%>, (for <S%G1063><s%> under <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> received the law <S%G3549><s%>,) what <S%G5101><s%> further <S%G2089><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> was there that <S%G450><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> should rise <S%G450><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be called <S%G3004><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Aaron <S%G2><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the priesthood <S%G2420><s%> being changed <S%G3346><s%>, there is made <S%G1096><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> necessity <S%G318><s%> a change <S%G3331><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3348><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> are spoken <S%G3004><s%> pertains <S%G3348><s%> to <S%G5443><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%>, of <S%G575><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> gave attendance <S%G4337><s%> at the altar <S%G2379><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is evident <S%G4271><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> sprang <S%G393><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> Judah <S%G2448><s%>; of <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> priesthood <S%G2420><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> far more <S%G4054><s%> evident <S%G2612><s%>: for that <S%G1487><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the likeness <S%G3665><s%> of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%> there arises <S%G450><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%>,

Who <S%G3739><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of a <S%G1785><s%> carnal <S%G4559><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of an <S%G2222><s%> endless <S%G179><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he testifies <S%G3754><s%>, You <S%G4771><s%> are a priest <S%G2409><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G1096><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> a putting away <S%G115><s%> of the previous <S%G4254><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of its weakness <S%G772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> useleness <S%G512><s%>. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> made <S%G5048><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> perfect <S%G5048><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> the bringing in <S%G1898><s%> of a <S%G1680><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> did <S%G1223><s%>; by which <S%G3739><s%> we draw near <S%G1448><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> inasmuch <S%G2596><s%> as <S%G3745><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> an oath he was made priest <S%G3728><s%>:

(For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G99999><s%> those priests <S%G2409><s%> were <S%G1526><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> an oath <S%G3728><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an oath <S%G3728><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him that said <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, The Lord <S%G2962><s%> swore <S%G3660><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will <S%G3338><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> repent <S%G3338><s%>, You <S%G4771><s%> are a priest <S%G2409><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the order <S%G5010><s%> of Melchizedek <S%G3198><s%>:)
By <S%G2596><s%> so much <S%G5118><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> the surety <S%G1450><s%> of a <S%G1242><s%> better <S%G2909><s%> testament <S%G1242><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1526><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> were <S%G1526><s%> <S%G99999><s%> many <S%G4119><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%>, because <S%G1223><s%> they were not allowed <S%G2967><s%> to continue <S%G3887><s%> by reason of death <S%G2288><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> man <S%G1223><s%>, because he <S%G846><s%> continues <S%G3306><s%> <S%G99999><s%> forever <S%G165><s%>, has <S%G2192><s%> an <S%G2420><s%> unchangeable <S%G531><s%> priesthood <S%G2420><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3606><s%> he is able <S%G1410><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> them <S%G3838><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the outermost <S%G3838><s%> that come <S%G4334><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, seeing he <S%G2198><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> lives <S%G2198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> make intercession <S%G1793><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> an high priest <S%G749><s%> was fitting <S%G4241><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%>; he is holy <S%G3741><s%>, innocent <S%G172><s%>, undefiled <S%G283><s%>, separate <S%G5563><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> higher <S%G5308><s%> than the heavens <S%G3772><s%>;

Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> needs <S%G318><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G99999><s%> daily <S%G2250><s%>, as <S%G5618><s%> did those high priests <S%G749><s%>, to offer up <S%G399><s%> sacrifice <S%G2378><s%>, first <S%G4386><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>, and then <S%G1899><s%> for the people <S%G2992><s%>'s: for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> once <S%G2178><s%>, when he offered up <S%G399><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> makes <S%G2525><s%> men <S%G444><s%> high priests <S%G749><s%> which have <S%G2192><s%> weaknesses <S%G769><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the oath <S%G3728><s%>, which was <S%G3588><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, appoints the Son <S%G5207><s%>, who is consecrated <S%G5048><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> evermore <S%G165><s%>.
